Clackamas Volunteer Search and Rescue

We support Clackamas County Search and Rescue by ensuring the highest level of training and equipment to provide the best possible response and outcome for every SAR mission in Clackamas County and beyond.

About us

CVSAR is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization designed to increase resources, raise funds, and promote public awareness in support of search and rescue volunteer activities conducted by the Clackamas County Sheriffâ€™s Office.

Support our work

You can support our search and rescue work by donating today.
